package:
zeroconf_avahi 0.2.3 Provides zeroconf services on avahi for ros systems. This is a c++ implementation. Daniel Stonier BSD http://wiki.ros.org/zeroconf_avahi https://github.com/stonier/zeroconf_avahi_suite https://github.com/stonier/zeroconf_avahi_suite/issues Daniel Stonier -->
catkin rosconsole roscpp zeroconf_msgs libavahi-client-dev libavahi-core-dev
rosconsole roscpp zeroconf_msgs libavahi-client-dev libavahi-core-dev avahi-daemon
